text: Francescantonio Nolè (9 June 1948 – 15 September 2022) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He was the Archbishop of Cosenza-Bisignano from 15 May 2015 until his death.Rinuncia dell'arcivescovo metropolita di Cosenza-Bisignano (Italia) e nomina del successore He was born in Potenza, Italy. He was also the Bishop of Tursi-Lagonegro from 2000 to 2015. Nolè died on 15 September 2022, at the age of 74.Diocesi: Cosenza, morto l’arcivescovo Francescantonio Nolè ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Francescantonio Nolè
